long_description: The REI Tala quilted skirt adds cute, cozy comfort and outdoorsy flair to your girl's outfit on a chilly day. Quilted, ripstop polyester shell and lining sandwich light polyester fill for warm comfort. Durable Water Resistant treatment helps block wind and water while preserving breathability.
short_description: The REI Tala quilted skirt adds cute, cozy comfort and outdoorsy flair to your girl's outfit on a chilly day.
